mapper.update: update bs_demo set uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dm_desc = #{dmDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, uuid, create_time, update_time, status, dm_desc from bs_demo
